summary: A married, Orthodox, Jerusalem butcher and Jewish father of four falls in love with his handsome, 22-year-old male apprentice, triggering the suspicions of his wife and the disapproval of his Orthodox community.
cast: Zohar Shtrauss|Ran Danker|Tinkerbell|Tzahi Grad|Isaac Sharry|Avi Grainik|Eva Zrihen-Attali|Haim Zanati|Mati Atlas|Iftach Ophir|Safrira Zachai|Lidor Daudi|Tal Barak|Bar Kalfin|Royi Zolicha|Eden Alon|Halil Steuer
title: Einayim Petukhoth
